purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of resources. A resource can be either a single item or a group of items defined to act as a resource.
purpose.example:
Examples of single resource items are:
Products
Persons
Facilities

Examples of resource groups are:
Tool kits
Work teams
purpose.p:
The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:
Identification assignment
Location
Effectivity
Approval
Property and descriptive representation assignment.

inscope.li: Grouping of resources defined to act as a resource in its own right.

outscope.li: Detailed descriptions of a resource item

description.p: The Resource_item UoF enables the identification of resources. A resource can be either a single item or a group of items.
